div.head: 中濕
div.div: moisture stroke; struck by moisture; to be moistened

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: moisture stroke; struck by moisture; to be moistened

sense.def: ① Pathological Condition a) identical with shi bi 濕痹 , moisture blockage. Mai jing 脈經 8: 太陽病，關節疼 煩，脈沉而緩者，為中濕 , “If in the case of major yang disease, the joints feel discomforting pain, the [movement in the] vessels is deep inside and retarded, then this is moisture stroke ”.b) Identical with shui du 水毒 , water poison: Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry suan 蒜 quoting Zhou hou bei ji fang 肘後備急方 : 水毒中人：一名中溪，一名中灑，一名水 病 , “Water poison strikes humans. Alternative designations are ‘struck by a rivulet’; ‘struck by sprinkling water’; and ‘water disease’”, writes: 水毒中人：一名中 溪，一名中濕，一名水病 , “Water poison strikes humans. Alternative designations are ‘struck by a rivulet’; ‘ struck by moisture ’; and ‘water disease’”.

②Reference to being soaked. Zheng lei ben cao 證類本草 Substance Entry gu yang jiao 羖羊角 quotes Ming yi bie lu 名醫別錄 : 勿 使中濕，濕即有毒 , “Do not allow it to be moistened . When it is moist it will be poisonous”.
